::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod still stands outside the Cybertronian Fire.
He activates his comlink, on a Pred channel.
"Where the HELL are you, Predicons? What, you scared we'll kick you're
sorry afterburners?"
He shuts off the comlink.
"Maybe that'll get them mad, and make them rush in, like idiots."
